ygData.subject: Re: Shaman Soloing...
ygData.msgSnippet: The Forgotten Halls are a good place for xp (not great on loot though), but it can be tough.  The rats there hit pretty hard, but doable with Temp on at level
ygData.messageBody:
The Forgotten Halls are a good place for xp (not great on loot
though), but it can be tough. The rats there hit pretty hard, but
doable with Temp on at level 25. Another place that I found, purely
by accident, was the sarnak fort in the southwest part of Lake of Ill
Omen. There are two sarnak's at the gate, but once you break their
camp, you can single pull sarnak's out of there all day long. Good
xp, decent loot (not uber, but decent) and there is hardly ever anyone
else in the zone, so no competition.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Greg Burns <freechylde@...> wrote:
>
> I have an idea, and you may like it.
>
> There is a little known zone, well its known but no body wants to go
there cause its abit out there. With the GOD expansion came a zone
called "Forgotten Halls". It is adjacent to Jaggedpine Forrest.
>
> Its an instanced zone, so you can solo there or go in with 5
friends. Go to the LDON camps and speak to the maguses there. Tell
them "Nedaria's Landing" and you will be ported there. ONce in
Nedaria's, go to the docks and find a High Elven Male on the docks, I
forget his name, i think it starts with an "E". Anyway, he is wearing
some kind of ornate tunic.
>
> Do the dialog words and you will be given access, much like an LDON.
If you look at your compass, there will be a line marking your
direction. Follow the line and you will enter a cave, where you will
see some short chick, again her name escapes me. Do the dialog with
her, and yo then have access. Click on the rock beside her and your in.
>
> The nice thing about this zone, is at lower levels, nothing aggros
you. In here you kill bats, rats, or "earthen rejects".. There is a
bat room, a rat room, and room with a mix of bats, rats, and earthen
rejects. The rejects have a little more hp and hit a little harder,
but should be ok. WARNING... only attack bats, rats,or the earthen
rejects. Attack anything else and the whole zone will unleash hell
ipon your head.
>
> The zone respawns quite fast, so if you go in with a couple people
you will never run out of mobs to kill. It does get boring, but if you
want quiet effortless killing, go here. I took my SK here and in about
3 hours, i managed to get her 2hs up from 20 to 100. Without a healer,
it is tough, but was doable.
>
> The xp is quite good. If its just you, then the xp is close to what
you would pick up in PC. With others, percentage wise it drops, but
again, with the abundance of mobs, that shouldnt matter.
>
> I took both of my clerics there and now their offensive and
defensive skills are maxed. Without the worry of aggro, its an awesome
place. I havent tried it, but with everything non-aggro there, one
could most likely fear kite in there. I.m not sure about quadding tho,
dont have the cahoneys to try that.
>
> At around level 53 or so, stuff will start to aggro you, so unless
you have good crowd control, this zone is no longer good solo.
>
> BTW, there is one way in and 2 ways out. 1) gate, or 2) speak to the
dude at zone in, tell him you wish to leave...and he will put his foot
to ur arse and zone you out.
>
> Hope this helps.
>
>
>
> rickcorriveau <rickcorriveau@...> wrote: I have a lvl 25 shaman
and I am trying to solo but wondering if I
> just have it wrong. I spend more time medding than anything else.
> What are some decent zones to attemp to solo at my lvl and what
> strageties do some of you higher lvl Shammies recommend I do? I need
> to build my skills so MMs are OUT !! PP is always nice but at this
> point not a necessity. My Mana pool is at about 1186 and HP is about
> 763 unbuffed. Is that on par or do I need to update my equipment.
> My base stats are currently.
> ----------|
> ENDR: 879 |
> AC: 506 |
> ATK: 385 |
> ----------|
> STR: 126 |
> STA: 124 |
> AGI: 126 |
> DEX: 138 |
> ----------|
> WIS: 185 |
> INT: 118 |
> CHA: 75 |
> ----------|--
> POISON: 40 |
> MAGIC: 37 |
> DISEASE: 47 |
> FIRE: 32 |
> COLD: 44 |
> ------------|
>
> Thanks Rick
>
> {
> 25th Shaman "Ribits"
> 57th Necro "DeathTicket"
> 54th Druid "LeafSkin"
> 63rd Cleric "Lifesphere"
> 61st Enchanter "Mindmender"
> }
> (Fenin Ro Server)
